price: (Intumwa) ziravuga ziti “Nyagasani wacu azi ko rwose twaboherejweho.”
arabic: قَالُواْ رَبُّنَا يَعۡلَمُ إِنَّآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qālū rabbunā yaʿlamu innā ilaykum lamur'salūna
